mapper.insert: insert into brand_management(id,legal_status,category_id,app_no,brand_no,name, transaction_status,similar_no,transaction_mode,price,scope, app_person,app_date,publish_date,originality,case_status,user,image_url,proxy_file,business_license, entity_license,individual_license,identity_card,application) values(#{id},#{brandLegalStatus.legalStatusId},#{brandCategory.categoryId},#{appNo},#{brandNo}, #{name},#{transactionStatus},#{similarNo},#{transactionMode},#{price},#{scope},#{appPerson}, #{appDate,javaType=date,jdbcType=DATE},#{publishDate,javaType=date,jdbcType=DATE},#{originality},#{caseStatus},#{user.userId}, #{imageUrl},#{proxyFile},#{businessLicense},#{entityLicense},#{individualLicense},#{identityCard},#{application}) on duplicate key update id=#{id}, legal_status=#{brandLegalStatus.legalStatusId},category_id=#{brandCategory.categoryId}, name=#{name},transaction_status=#{transactionStatus},app_no=#{appNo},brand_no=#{brandNo}, similar_no=#{similarNo},transaction_mode=#{transactionMode},price=#{price},scope=#{scope}, app_person=#{appPerson},app_date=#{appDate,javaType=date,jdbcType=DATE}, publish_date=#{publishDate,javaType=date,jdbcType=DATE}, originality=#{originality},case_status=#{caseStatus}, user=#{user.userId},image_url=#{imageUrl},proxy_file=#{proxyFile},business_license=#{businessLicense}, entity_license=#{entityLicense},individual_license=#{individualLicense},identity_card=#{identityCard}, application=#{application}
mapper.select: SELECT rs.*,u.user_id,u.username FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.user,b.app_no,b.brand_no, b.name,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price,b.app_person, b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.image_url,b.proxy_file,b.business_license, b.entity_license,b.individual_license,b.identity_card,b.application, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name, ubm.monitor_status FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id=bc.category_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN brand_legal_status bls ON b.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id left join user_brand_management ubm on b.id=ubm.brand where ubm.trash_status=1 and ubm.user=#{userId} LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize} ) rs LEFT JOIN user_brand_management ubm ON ubm.brand=rs.id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=ubm.user
select count(*) from brand_management b where b.id in (select brand from user_brand_management where user =#{userId} and trash_status=1)
select br.remark_id,br.brand_id,br.content,br.remark_time,u.user_id,u.username from brand_remark br left join users u on br.user=u.user_id where br.brand_id=#{brandId}
select category_id,category_name from brand_category order by category_id asc;
select legal_status_id,legal_status_name from brand_legal_status order by legal_status_id asc;

SELECT bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name,count(*) brandCount FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN brand_legal_status bls ON b.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id WHERE b.id IN (SELECT brand FROM user_brand_management WHERE USER =#{userId} and trash_status=1) GROUP BY bls.legal_status_name order by bls.legal_status_id asc;

SELECT bc.category_id,bc.category_name,count(*) brandCount FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id=bc.category_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id WHERE b.id IN (SELECT brand FROM user_brand_management WHERE USER =#{userId} and trash_status=1) GROUP BY bc.category_name order by bc.category_id asc;

SELECT rs.*, u.user_id,u.username from (SELECT b.id,b.user,b.app_no,b.brand_no,b.similar_no,b.scope, b.name,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price,b.app_person, b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.image_url,b.proxy_file,b.business_license, b.entity_license,b.individual_license,b.identity_card,b.application, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id=bc.category_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN brand_legal_status bls ON b.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id where b.id=#{brandId}) rs LEFT JOIN user_brand_management ubm ON ubm.brand=rs.id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=ubm.user
select notice_type_id,notice_type_desc from brand_notice_types order by notice_type_id asc
mapper.delete: delete from user_brand_management where brand = #{brandId} and user=#{shareUserId}
mapper.select:
select bm.id,bm.app_no,bm.brand_no,bm.name,bm.similar_no,bm.scope,bm.transaction_status,bm.transaction_mode,bm.price,bm.app_person,bm.app_date,bm.publish_date, u.user_id,u.username,bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name from brand_management bm left join user_brand_management ubm on bm.id=ubm.brand left join users u on ubm.user=u.user_id left join brand_category bc on bm.category_id=bc.category_id left join brand_legal_status bls on bm.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id where ubm.trash_status=1 and ubm.brand in
#{brandId}

SELECT rs.*,u.user_id,u.username FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.user,b.app_no,b.brand_no, b.name,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price,b.app_person, b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.image_url,b.proxy_file,b.business_license, b.entity_license,b.individual_license,b.identity_card,b.application, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name
FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id=bc.category_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN brand_legal_status bls ON b.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id WHERE b.id IN (SELECT brand FROM user_brand_management WHERE USER =#{userId} and trash_status=2) ORDER BY b.app_date DESC, b.app_person, b.name LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize} ) rs LEFT JOIN user_brand_management ubm ON ubm.brand=rs.id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id=ubm.user ORDER BY rs.app_date DESC, rs.app_person, rs.name
select count(*) from brand_management b where b.id in (select brand from user_brand_management where user =#{userId} and trash_status=2)

SELECT rs.*,u.user_id,u.username FROM ( SELECT b.id,b.user,b.app_no,b.brand_no, b.name,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price,b.app_person, b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.image_url,b.proxy_file,b.business_license, b.entity_license,b.individual_license,b.identity_card,b.application, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name
FROM brand_management b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id=bc.category_id LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user=u.user_id LEFT JOIN brand_legal_status bls ON b.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id WHERE b.id IN (SELECT brand FROM user_brand_management WHERE USER =#{userId} and trash_status=2)
AND (b.app_no LIKE #{keyword_pattern} or b.name like #{keyword_pattern} OR b.app_person LIKE #{keyword_pattern} or b.brand_no LIKE #{keyword_pattern} OR bls.legal_status_name LIKE #{keyword_pattern} or bc.category_name like #{keyword_pattern})
ORDER BY b.app_date DESC, b.app_person, b.name LIMIT #{page.startIndex}, #{page.pageSize}) as rs
JOIN user_brand_management ubm ON rs.id = ubm.brand JOIN users u ON u.user_id = ubm.user ORDER BY rs.app_date DESC, rs.app_person, rs.name
mapper.update:
update user_brand_management set monitor_status=1 where user=#{userId} and brand in
#{brandId}

update user_brand_management set monitor_status=0 where user=#{userId} and brand in
#{brandId}
mapper.select: select ub.id,ub.app_no,ub.brand_no,ub.name,ub.similar_no,ub.scope,ub.transaction_status,ub.transaction_mode,ub.price,ub.app_person, ub.app_date,ub.publish_date,ub.create_time,ub.monitor_status, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name,u.user_id,u.username from (select b.id,b.legal_status,b.category_id,b.app_no,b.brand_no,b.name,b.similar_no,b.scope,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price, b.app_person,b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.create_time,u.monitor_status from brand_management b left join user_brand_management u on b.id=u.brand where u.user=#{userId} and u.trash_status=1 and u.monitor_status=1 limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize} ) ub left join user_brand_management ubm on ub.id=ubm.brand left join brand_category bc on ub.category_id=bc.category_id left join brand_legal_status bls on ub.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id left join users u on ubm.user=u.user_id
select count(*) from brand_management b left join user_brand_management u on b.id=u.brand where u.user=#{userId} and u.trash_status=1 and u.monitor_status=1

select ub.id,ub.app_no,ub.brand_no,ub.name,ub.similar_no,ub.scope,ub.transaction_status,ub.transaction_mode,ub.price,ub.app_person, ub.app_date,ub.publish_date,ub.create_time,ub.monitor_status, bc.category_id,bc.category_name,bls.legal_status_id,bls.legal_status_name,u.user_id,u.username from (select b.id,b.legal_status,b.category_id,b.app_no,b.brand_no,b.name,b.similar_no,b.scope,b.transaction_status,b.transaction_mode,b.price, b.app_person,b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.create_time,u.monitor_status from brand_management b left join user_brand_management u on b.id=u.brand where u.user=#{userId} and u.trash_status=1 and u.monitor_status=1
and (b.app_no like #{keyword_pattern} or b.brand_no like #{keyword_pattern} or b.name like #{keyword_pattern})
limit #{page.startIndex},#{page.pageSize} ) ub left join user_brand_management ubm on ub.id=ubm.brand left join brand_category bc on ub.category_id=bc.category_id left join brand_legal_status bls on ub.legal_status=bls.legal_status_id left join users u on ubm.user=u.user_id

select count(*) from brand_management b left join user_brand_management u on b.id=u.brand where u.user=#{userId} and u.trash_status=1 and u.monitor_status=1
and (b.app_no like #{keyword_pattern} or b.brand_no like #{keyword_pattern} or b.name like #{keyword_pattern})
mapper.update: update brand_management set transaction_status=1 where id=#{brandId}
update brand_management set transaction_status=0 where name=#{name}
